body:
The plan was to build OpenAL from code on Android as you mentioned. But as I'm reading the earlier work around making OpenAL working on Android, I'm seeing some compatibility issues with the OpenSL backend [1]. I have to review the OpenSL versions distributed with Android.

github.com/golang/al with LGPL sounds good to me.

[1] http://repo.or.cz/w/openal-soft.git/blob/HEAD:/Alc/backends/opensl.c
